channel.item:
wimsa@solidgoldstudios.co.za (WiMSA Network | Solid Gold Studios) WiMSA | Solid Gold Studios full Meet the chairs! | Lindi Nakedi and Thabile Makgala Meet the chairs! | Lindi Nakedi and Thabile Makgala Talking to our outgoing and incoming chairpersons 12:26 no 1 Thu, 06 Dec 2018 14:00:00 +0200

WiMSA deputy chairperson, Petro du Pisani, talks to our outgoing chairperson, Lindi Nakedi, about WiMSA's accomplishments over the past two years. Incoming chairperson Thabile Makgala gives us a glimpse into what lies ahead for WiMSA over the next couple of years.

For more podcasts, visit SolidGoldStudios.co.za/wimsa

WiMSA deputy chairperson, Petro du Pisani, talks to our outgoing chairperson, Lindi Nakedi, about WiMSA's accomplishments over the past two years. Incoming chairperson Thabile Makgala gives us a glimpse into what lies ahead for WiMSA over the next couple of years. Lindi Nakedi, Thabile Makgala, achievements, strategy wimsa-s01-e001guid>
